forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 28. West northwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 54. Southwest wind 5 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 8pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 34, with temperatures rising to around 41 overnight. Southwest wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8am. Partly sunny, with a high near 41. Northwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 18, with temperatures rising to around 25 overnight. Southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Isolated Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated rain showers after 5pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 43. Southwest wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 9pm, then rain and snow showers likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 15, with temperatures rising to around 20 overnight. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Snow Showers then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before 8am. Partly sunny, with a high near 25. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: It’s still great! New groom this morning over a strong base with fresh snow . The upper loops have great coverage : both the skate and classic are premium .

nubsNob.liftsOpen: No lifts today due to power issues.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are covered in heavy wet snow this morning. We do not plan to groom today.
nubsNob.comments:
UPDATE- Nub's Nob will not open on March 20.

Due to frequent power blinks we are not able to run our chairlifts today. The lodge will remain opened until noon today. We plan to open tomorrow for skiing and riding at 9 AM.
